original_text: Wherefore the princes were wroth with Jeremiah, and smote him, and put him in prison in the house of Jonathan the scribe: for they had made that the prison.
korean_text: 고관들이 노여워하여 예레미야를 때려서 서기관 요나단의 집에 가두었으니 이는 그들이 이 집을 옥으로 삼았음이더라

sentences.original_text: Wherefore princes were wroth with Jeremiah
in the house of Jonathan the scribe
for they had made that the prison
